bug.summary: async function fails in multiple examples
bug.description:
A bunch of samples where ray async fails: example1: <denchmark-code>import ray @ray.remote async def test(a): print(a) ray.init() # fails #ray.init(local_mode=True) # fails ray.get(test.remote("hi")) </denchmark-code>
example2: <denchmark-code>import ray @ray.remote class Actor: async def test(self, a): print(a) #ray.init() # works ray.init(local_mode=True) # fails actor = Actor.remote() ray.get(actor.test.remote("hi")) </denchmark-code>
Thanks!
